description: Surrounded by the property’s own vineyards, this restaurant nestlings at the bottom of a gentle hill features an elegant dining room and a beautiful terrace for outdoor dining in fine weather. The cuisine is contemporary (yet not excessively so), with a few freshwater fish also featuring on the menu, while the wine list showcases a good selection of wines. The property’s own wines are available for purchase in the shop.
